item.title: Loan Marketing Segmentation
item.description: Shiny app GitHub repo R Markdown report with code/visualizations This is an old project from school. Very rudimentary, but it represents one of my earliest attempts at a “real” predictive modeling problem, and in any case I need some filler content to start populating this site. Using publicly available data from crowd-sourced lending platform Lending Club, I set out to create a classifier which would help solve a marketing problem which (I imagine) a company like this would encounter.
